name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
Senior WebTest Engineer with 8 years of hands-on experience in leveraging **Playwright**, **Selenium**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **React** to ensure high-quality software delivery. I possess a solid understanding of test automation frameworks and methodologies, and I have utilized tools like **Celery**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Django** to enhance application performance and reliability. My proficiency in **SQL Alchemy**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis** supports efficient data handling and management.

I am well-versed in cloud services, specifically **Azure**, **Heroku**, and **GCP**, and have orchestrated containerized applications using **k8s** with infrastructure as code practices utilizing **Terraform** and **Helm**. I thrive in Agile environments and excel at problem-solving, ensuring the delivery of compliant applications aligned with industry standards.

My strong communication skills facilitate seamless collaboration with cross-functional teams, driving the development of enterprise-grade solutions. Additionally, I have led testing strategies that incorporate CI/CD automation using **GitHub Actions**, emphasizing quality and efficiency throughout the development process.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Playwright** and **Selenium** to automate end-to-end testing for web applications, ensuring high-quality software releases with a **95% pass rate** on automated test cases.
Developed and maintained test frameworks leveraging **TypeScript** and **Python**, collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** for continuous integration and deployment.
Designed and executed performance tests utilizing **k8s** and optimized server resources to handle up to **10,000 concurrent users**, achieving a response time of under **200ms**.
Implemented API testing using **OpenAPI** specifications, ensuring compliance and functionality for functional endpoints with **100% coverage** of critical API services.
Led initiatives to integrate **Celery** and **RabbitMQ** for task scheduling and message brokering in test environments, improving resource utilization and reducing execution time by **40%**.
Conducted thorough code reviews and provided mentorship to junior engineers on best testing practices, enhancing team productivity and code quality.
Collaborated with developers to troubleshoot issues in applications built using **Django** and **React**, fostering strong communication channels and problem-solving workflows.
Utilized database technologies such as **PostgreSQL** and **Redis** to set up test datasets and manage state, improving testing efficiency by approximately **30%**.
Created comprehensive documentation of testing protocols and results using Agile methodologies, facilitating clear communication with stakeholders and project management teams.
Developed regression test suites for both web and API services, ensuring that new features did not negatively impact existing functionalities.
Utilized **Terraform** and **Helm** for infrastructure management and deployment of test environments across **Azure**, **Heroku**, and **GCP**, enhancing environment reliability and scalability.
Participated in daily stand-ups and sprint planning, effectively communicating testing progress and aligning with project deadlines.

Utilized **Playwright** and **Selenium** for automated testing and validation of web applications built with **React** and **TypeScript**, ensuring high-quality user experiences through comprehensive test coverage.
Implemented test-driven development and continuous integration practices using **GitHub Actions**, resulting in a **35% reduction** in deployment time and increased code reliability across **12** projects.
Collaborated effectively in an **Agile** environment, improving team communication and productivity by facilitating daily stand-ups and retrospectives, enhancing the overall project delivery process by **20%**.
Developed and maintained back-end services using **Python (Django)** and **SQL Alchemy**, integrating with **PostgreSQL** and **Redis** for data persistence and caching, enhancing performance by **40%** in data retrieval operations.
Established reliable message queue systems with **RabbitMQ** and **Celery** to manage asynchronous tasks and improve application responsiveness, leading to timely processing of over **1 million** transactions per month.
Executed cloud infrastructure management using **Terraform**, **k8s**, and **Helm** on **Azure** and **GCP** platforms, ensuring a robust and scalable deployment model for the development environment.
Led the integration of **OpenAPI** specifications to document and test various APIs, improving developer onboarding time by **50%** and fostering better communication between front-end and back-end teams.
Developed and implemented efficient testing strategies that facilitated faster bug detection and resolution, contributing to a culture of proactive problem-solving and continuous improvement.

Utilized **Python** (including **Django** and **FastAPI**) to develop and maintain high-quality test cases for backend services, reinforcing thorough testing strategies while ensuring alignment with the **OpenAPI** specifications for clear documentation.
Implemented **TypeScript** and utilized **React** to design automated tests for frontend applications, enhancing the reliability of UI components with a focus on user experience.
Leveraged **Selenium** and **Playwright** for cross-browser testing, ensuring seamless functionality across **React** (v18) applications and maintaining compatibility with both modern and legacy systems.
Streamlined test execution and reporting processes with **GitHub Actions**, achieving an **80%** reduction in deployment times through early bug detection methodologies.
Developed distributed task management with **Celery** and message queues using **RabbitMQ**, substantially improving the execution of asynchronous testing tasks and enabling real-time feedback.
Collaborated in an **Agile** environment to enhance communication among cross-functional teams, resulting in the identification of critical testing opportunities and adhering to project timelines effectively.
Created comprehensive test plans that encompassed storage systems like **PostgreSQL** and **Redis**, ensuring efficient handling of database interactions and validating performance under load conditions.
Designed and implemented automated functional tests, using **SQL Alchemy** for database interaction validation, ensuring respective data integrity and compliance with accepted standards.
Managed cloud resources with **Terraform** for provisioning test infrastructures in **Azure**, **Heroku**, and **GCP**, optimizing resource allocation and test environments similar to production configurations.
Drove continuous improvement in testing frameworks by conducting retrospectives; adopted metrics-based approach to refine testing strategies, ensuring secure and efficient delivery of applications.
